sentences.sContent: We aim to provide a service that is balanced and unbiased.
sentences.sCn: 我们的目标是提供一种公平公正的服务。

phrases.pCn: 不偏估计，公正（无偏）评价

remMethod.val: un (无) + biased (有偏见的) → 没有偏见的

trans.tranOther: unbiased information, opinions, advice etc is fair because the person giving it is not influenced by their own or other people’s opinions
